doc.description: HMC58xx magnetometer. Module for standalone operation/logging of a HMC58xx magnetometer. An arbitrary rotation between the sensor frame and the IMU frame can be compensated with a MAG_TO_IMU rotation (defined by three euler angles). The three angles must be defined to enable this correction. Otherwise it is assumed that the axis are aligned.

define.name: MODULE_HMC58XX_SYNC_SEND
define.description: Send IMU_RAW message with each new measurement (default: FALSE)

define.name: MODULE_HMC58XX_UPDATE_AHRS
define.description: Copy measurements to imu and send as ABI message (default: FALSE)

define.name: MAG_TO_IMU_PHI
define.description: Rotation between sensor frame and IMU frame (phi angle)

define.name: MAG_TO_IMU_THETA
define.description: Rotation between sensor frame and IMU frame (theta angle)

define.name: MAG_TO_IMU_PSI
define.description: Rotation between sensor frame and IMU frame (psi angle)

makefile.raw: ifeq ($(MAG_HMC58XX_I2C_DEV),) $(error mag_hmc58xx module error: please configure MAG_HMC58XX_I2C_DEV) endif
